title: Report: Fiat Chrysler in talks to merge with Peugeot-owner PSA
text:
Fiat Chrysler and Peugeot-maker PSA Group of France are in discussions to potentially move forward with a merger that could be worth $50 billion, the Wall Street Journal first reported.

The big picture: Last May, Fiat Chrysler submitted a proposal for a 50-50 merger with Renault, but the deal couldn't get off the ground without the French government's approval, a major shareholder in Renault, CNBC notes. However, the new talks between Fiat and Peugeot are fluid and a final deal may not even be reached.
description: The merger could be worth $50 billion.
